4248.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|84|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|118|20$قَالُواْ|say,|64|92|101$رَبُّنَا|`Our Lord,|89|118|1253$ٱللَّهُ|(is) Allah,`|91|120|123$ثُمَّ|then|50|78|293$ٱسْتَقَـٰمُواْ|stand firm -|101|115|7427$تَتَنَزَّلُ|will descend|100|109|15291$عَلَيْهِمُ|on them|76|93|602$ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ|the Angels,|97|114|2202$أَلَّا|`Do not|72|89|2011$تَخَافُواْ|fear,|82|99|15292$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|121|25$تَحْزَنُواْ|grieve|90|99|3304$وَأَبْشِرُواْ|but receive the glad tidings|202|219|15293$بِٱلْجَنَّةِ|of Paradise|93|127|15294$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|95|232$كُنتُمْ|you were|81|115|214$تُوعَدُونَ|promised.|101|118|6059$

4249.verse: نَحْنُ|We|62|69|103$أَوْلِيَآؤُكُمْ|(are) your protectors|161|175|15295$فِى|in|48|62|89$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|the life|82|96|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world|112|126|818$وَفِى|and in|62|76|487$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ|the Hereafter.|114|121|978$وَلَكُمْ|And for you|97|103|387$فِيهَا|therein|66|79|253$مَا|whatever|82|95|262$تَشْتَهِىٓ|desire|85|98|15296$أَنفُسُكُمْ|your souls,|92|105|8871$وَلَكُمْ|and for you|96|109|387$فِيهَا|therein|66|79|253$مَا|what|53|59|262$تَدَّعُونَ|you ask,|87|87|15297$

4253.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|80|46$يُلَقَّـٰهَآ|it is granted|100|115|13543$إِلَّا|except|65|80|86$ٱلَّذِينَ|(to) those who|120|135|20$صَبَرُواْ|(are) patient|105|120|6772$وَمَا|and not|71|86|46$يُلَقَّـٰهَآ|it is granted|100|108|13543$إِلَّا|except|65|118|86$ذُو|(to the) owner|118|224|3383$حَظٍّ|(of) fortune|98|204|13542$عَظِيمٍ|great.|75|128|3522$

4254.verse: وَإِمَّا|And if|61|68|5697$يَنزَغَنَّكَ|whisper comes to you|165|179|7101$مِنَ|from|50|64|156$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ|the Shaitan,|102|116|1466$نَزْغٌ|an evil suggestion,|144|158|7102$فَٱسْتَعِذْ|then seek refuge|132|139|7103$بِٱللَّهِ‌ۖ|in Allah.|72|96|79$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|141|396$هُوَ|[He]|49|98|298$ٱلسَّمِيعُ|(is) the All-Hearer,|144|193|1170$ٱلْعَلِيمُ|the All-Knower.|122|146|342$

4248.verse: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah " and then remained on a right course - the angels will descend upon them, [saying], "Do not fear and do not grieve but receive good tidings of Paradise, which you were promised.

4249.verse: We [angels] were your allies in worldly life and [are so] in the Hereafter. And you will have therein whatever your souls desire, and you will have therein whatever you request [or wish]

4250.verse: As accommodation from a [Lord who is] Forgiving and Merciful."

4251.verse: And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allah and does righteousness and says, "Indeed, I am of the Muslims."

4252.verse: And not equal are the good deed and the bad. Repel [evil] by that [deed] which is better; and thereupon the one whom between you and him is enmity [will become] as though he was a devoted friend.

4253.verse: But none is granted it except those who are patient, and none is granted it except one having a great portion [of good].

4254.verse: And if there comes to you from Satan an evil suggestion, then seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

4255.verse: And of His signs are the night and day and the sun and moon. Do not prostrate to the sun or to the moon, but prostate to Allah, who created them, if it should be Him that you worship.

4256.verse: But if they are arrogant - then those who are near your Lord exalt Him by night and by day, and they do not become weary.
